title: Mongolia

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the Factional Kill
- Lead a horse charge across town, dealing an Astral Powerful attack to two random non-Civs (Costs 8 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - All Factional Kills while Mongolia is alive are Astral and redirect immune.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were slain by a Mongolian Keshig.” (Factional Kill)
“They were trampled by the Mongol horde.” (Horse Charge Kill)
